tool_description: Creates migration schedules for transitioning customers to modified subscription plans with phased rollouts and timeline management.

migration_strategy.description: Migration approach: immediate, gradual_rollout, opt_in, forced_migration

total_customers.description: Total number of customers to migrate

rollout_duration_days.description: Duration of gradual rollout in days

batch_size.description: Number of customers per migration batch

priority_segments.description: Customer segments to prioritize in migration

exclude_segments.description: Customer segments to exclude from migration

business_days_only.description: Whether to schedule migrations only on business days

error_messages: Invalid migration_strategy: Must be one of [immediate, gradual_rollout, opt_in, forced_migration].
Invalid start_date: Must be a valid future date in ISO 8601 format.
Invalid total_customers: Must be a positive integer.
Invalid rollout_duration_days: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 365.
Invalid batch_size: Must be a positive integer not exceeding total_customers.
Conflicting segments: priority_segments and exclude_segments cannot contain the same values.
usage: Specify migration_strategy, start_date, and total_customers. For gradual rollouts, set rollout_duration_days and batch_size. Configure priority_segments, exclude_segments, and business_days_only as needed.

migration_phases.description: List of migration phases with dates and customer counts

completion_date.description: Expected completion date of full migration

estimated_duration_days.description: Estimated total duration of migration process
